```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("C:/Users/sumia/Downloads/benthic_series_from_image.csv")
```


##---Pivoting Longer---##
# pivoting can help reshape our data
```{r}
df_long <- df |>
  pivot_longer(-Year, names_to = "Category", values_to = "Area_km2")
```


##---Plot---##
```{r}
# Simple faceted line plot
ggplot(df_long, aes(Year, Area_km2)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
  geom_point(color = "steelblue") +
  facet_wrap(~Category, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  labs(title = "Benthic surface area by category (Heron Reef, 2002–2023)",
       x = "Year", y = "Surface area (km²)")

```
